body_content.explanation: a particular place or page within a larger website:
examples: On the home page, click on the name of the subsite you wish to visit.
You can reach the sub-site by clicking on an ad on the page.

body_content.explanation: a place within a larger place where something is, was, or will be built, or where something happened, is happening, or will happen:
examples: These are the results of the water monitoring activities at this subsite.
The nasal cavity area can be further divided into several sub-sites.
